item.title: Project 1: Coin Toss - Python Tutorials For Beginners #4
item.description: Let’s Create Something Amazing With Python! In this blog, we’ll be learning how to create a Python program to make a simple coin toss project. This project is perfect for beginners. Today, We all learn about the practical application of concepts in Python. This program will allow the computer to randomly choose one of two outcomes and display it. Concepts Used In This Project (1) Variables (2) Datatypes (3) Random Module
